success.title: Settings updated successfully
success.description: Your policy settings have been updated.

schedule.title: Backup Schedule
schedule.description: Schedule automatic backups of your files.

retention.title: Backup Retention
retention.description: Configure how long to keep backups.

latest.label: Latest Backups
latest.description: The number of latest backups to keep.

hourly.label: Hourly Backups
hourly.description: The number of hourly backups to keep.

daily.label: Daily Backups
daily.description: The number of daily backups to keep.

weekly.label: Weekly Backups
weekly.description: The number of weekly backups to keep.

monthly.label: Monthly Backups
monthly.description: The number of monthly backups to keep.

annual.label: Annual Backups
annual.description: The number of annual backups to keep.

info.title: How backup retention works
info.description: BlinkDisk keeps the number of latest backups you set for each time period. A backup is kept if it matches any rule, others are removed to save space.

files.title: Excluded Files
files.description: Exclude files and directories from backups.

denylist.label: Excluded Files and Directories
denylist.description: Files, directories and extensions to exclude from backups.

denyfiles.label: Exclusion Rule Files
denyfiles.description: All filenames to files containing exclusion rules.

maxFileSize.label: Maximum File Size
maxFileSize.description: The maximum file size to include in backups.

excludeCacheDirs.label: Exclude Cache Directories
excludeCacheDirs.description: Exclude common cache directories in backups.
